narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.  The inspection was conducted on 27 SEP 2018.  The site
manager, who maintains the acquisition records, was on leave at the time of inspection so the records review was
completed on 5 OCT 2018. The inspection and an exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
